trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Fremont
There were no other sightings in Fremont on or around April 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsThis made a huge noise. It sounded like firecrackers as it passed by . It was liike it had an aura to it. I talked to people at school, and they said they heard it aswell, but only in certain areas. You couldn't tell where the sound was coming from, until you looked up. I saw the ship and it looked like a triangle. It was bigger and closer than normal airplanes. It's lights were flashing , and it was traveling slower than normal airplanes. Also the lights were much brighter, i rembemr a red and white ones. After one of them passed, yet another passed going in the same direction. Both made the huge staticky, firecracker, gunshot noises as they passed. And it slowly faded away but I can still saw it.
Summary: big triangle really close to ground (not like normal)
